trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de criação num designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is used as a container for other controls, especially when controls are generated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controlo é utilizado como um contentor para outros controlos, especialmente quando controlos são gerados através de programação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The PanelDesigner class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: A classe de PanelDesigner fornece suporte de momento da conceção para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controlos um designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: However, for all new implementations of the Panel control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> instead of the PanelDesigner.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, para todas as implementações novas do controlo painel, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>em vez do PanelDesigner.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Num designer visual, quando muda de origem para a vista de estrutura, marcação de código fonte que descreve associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controlo é analisado e uma versão de tempo de criação do controlo é criada na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando voltar a mudar para vista de origem, o controlo de tempo de criação é transferido para o código de origem do markup e editá-lo na marcação de página Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>método mapeia um valor e a propriedade especificada para um estilo de marcação especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>método fornece notificação quando é ligado um comportamento para o estruturador.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework construções internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>classe quando cria associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controlo ou uma cópia desse controlo na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: Mapeia um valor e a propriedade especificada para um estilo de marcação especificado.

trans-unit.source: The MapPropertyToStyle method provides special handling for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties, but calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> base method for all other values of the `propName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método MapPropertyToStyle fornece processamento especial para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>Propriedades, mas as chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>base método para todos os outros valores do `propName` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the property name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia contendo o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An object that is the property value.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a notificação quando um comportamento está ligado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: The OnBehaviorAttached method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método OnBehaviorAttached o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>base método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then the OnBehaviorAttached maps the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties to the appropriate style by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method, if these properties are defined.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o OnBehaviorAttached mapeia o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>Propriedades para o estilo adequada, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>método, se estas propriedades são definidas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>
